snippet.title: Toni Island Adventure - Gameplay Trailer [EN]
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2908830/Toni_Island_Adventure/

In Toni's Island Adventure, you take control of Toni, a sailor dog passionate about pizza who faces challenges after a tragic shipwreck on a mysterious island inhabited by other dogs.

Solve puzzles, battle enemies, and uncover the mysterious stories of the paradisiacal Salamino Island to make your way back home. Don't forget to take a break for a slice of pizza!

Music by RoccoW
